{"id":1088012106,"question_id":72,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"7 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1698720218,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"5 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1088012106/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Edit Distance","memory":"43.5 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int minDistance(String word1, String word2) {\n\n        //https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MiqoA-yF-0M&t=975s\n\n        int len1= word1.length();\n        int len2 = word2.length();\n\n        int[][] dp = new int[len1+1][len2+1];\n\n        for(int i=0; i<=len1; i++){\n            dp[i][0] = i; // basic insertion\n        }\n\n        for(int j=0; j<=len2; j++){\n            dp[0][j] = j;  // basic insertion\n        }\n\n        for(int i=1; i<=len1; i++){\n            for(int j=1; j<=len2; j++){\n\n                if(word1.charAt(i-1) == word2.charAt(j-1)){\n                    dp[i][j] = dp[i-1][j-1];\n\n                }else{\n                    int upleft = dp[i-1][j-1];\n                    int up = dp[i-1][j];\n                    int left = dp[i][j-1];\n\n                    dp[i][j] = 1 + Math.min(upleft, Math.min(up, left));\n                }\n            }\n        }\n\n        return dp[len1][len2];\n\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"edit-distance","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
